GemBagDescription: A bag for storing valuable gems.
SmithingBagDescription: A bag for storing ores, bars, and geodes.
MineralBagDescription: A bag for storing precious minerals.
MiningBagDescription: A bag for storing ores, geodes, and gems.
ConstructionBagDescription:
A bag for storing signs, fences, floors, paths,
and construction resources.
TreeBagDescription: A bag for storing tree seeds and products.
AnimalProductsBagDescription: A bag for storing animal products.
RecyclingBagDescription: A bag for storing recyclables and trash.
LootBagDescription: A bag for storing monster loot.
ForagingBagDescription: A bag for storing foraged goods.
ArtifactBagDescription: A bag for storing rare artifacts.
OceanFishBagDescription: A bag for storing ocean fish.
RiverFishBagDescription: A bag for storing river fish.
LakeFishBagDescription: A bag for storing lake fish.
MiscellaneousFishBagDescription: A bag for storing miscellaneous fish.
FarmersBagDescription: A bag for storing sprinklers, fertilizers, and scarecrows.
FoodBagDescription: A bag for storing cooked dishes and ingredients.
CropBagDescription: A bag for storing farmed fruits, vegetables, and flowers.
BundleBagDescription:
A bag for storing items required by
bundles in the Community Center.
RucksackDescription: A bag capable of storing most standard items.
OmniBagDescription: A bag for storing other bags.
DepositAllToolTip:
Deposit all items from
inventory into this bag
WithdrawAllToolTip:
Withdraw all items from
this bag into inventory
AutofillOnToolTip:
Toggle autofill (currently on)
If on, picked up items will automatically
be placed inside this bag
AutofillOffToolTip:
Toggle autofill (currently off)
If on, picked up items will automatically
be placed inside this bag
HelpInfoToolTip:
Right-click an item to transfer 1 (hold to repeat).
Hold Shift to transfer several.
Hold Ctrl to transfer half.
BundleTaskIncompleteToolTip:
{{CompletedCount}}/{{TotalCount}} Items Completed
{{ReadyToCompleteCount}}/{{TotalCount}} Items Ready to Complete
{{RequiredCount}}/{{TotalCount}} Required
RucksackAutofillLowPriorityToolTip:
Toggle autofill (currently on - low priority)
If on, picked up items will automatically be placed inside this rucksack
if there is already a stack of the item inside.

Current priority - Low (This rucksack will be autofilled after regular bags)
RucksackAutofillHighPriorityToolTip:
Toggle autofill (currently on - high priority)
If on, picked up items will automatically be placed inside this rucksack
if there is already a stack of the item inside.

Current priority - High (This rucksack will be autofilled before regular bags)
RucksackAutofillOffToolTip:
Toggle autofill (currently off)
If on, picked up items will automatically be placed inside this rucksack
if there is already a stack of the item inside
RucksackSortPropertyTimeToolTip:
Sorting Property - Time

Items appear in the order that
they were added to this rucksack.
RucksackSortPropertySimilarityToolTip:
Sorting Property - Similarity

Items are first sorted and grouped by
Category name, then grouped by Item Id.
.
